00010     void EcalHit::Print(Option_t *option) const {
00011         std::cout << "EcalHit { " << "id: " << std::hex << getID() << std::dec
00012                 << ",  energy: " << getEnergy() << "MeV, time: " << getTime()
00013                 << "ns, amplitude: " << getAmplitude() << "}" << std::endl;

00017     int EcalHit::getCell() const {
00018         return (getID() >> 12); // depends on internal knowledge of Detector Id, but efficiency is important for this method
00019     }
